name: Dennis J. ROBERTS II, Attorney General v. PROVIDENCE WATER SUPPLY BOARD
name_abbreviation: Roberts v. Providence Water Supply Board

parties: Dennis J. ROBERTS II, Attorney General v. PROVIDENCE WATER SUPPLY BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioner’s motion for a partial stay of the order of the Public Utilities Commission as prayed is denied.
WEISBERGER, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., John R. McDermott, Special Asst. Atty. Gen., for petitioner.
William J. McGair, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Dennis J. ROBERTS II, Attorney General v. PROVIDENCE WATER SUPPLY BOARD.
No. 81-331-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
July 23, 1981.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., John R. McDermott, Special Asst. Atty. Gen., for petitioner.
William J. McGair, Providence, for respondent.
